faq_database.answer: To reset your password, click on the 'Forgot Password' link on the login page, and follow the instructions sent to your registered email.
You can update your account information by logging into your account settings and editing your personal details or business information.
To submit an invoice, go to the 'Billing' section of your account and click on 'Submit Invoice'.
Please refer to our Pricing page for detailed information on our services and packages.
To update your business hours, navigate to the 'Business Settings' section of your account and make the changes under 'Operating Hours'.
To update your class roster, go to the 'Manage Classes' section in your account, where you can add or remove children as needed.
Yes, you can update your program details in the 'Program Settings' section of your account.
If you're experiencing a technical issue, please go to the 'Support' section in your account and submit a ticket with a detailed description of the problem.
For billing inquiries, please visit the 'Billing' section and review your payment history or contact our support team for further assistance.
To cancel your subscription, please visit the 'Subscription' section in your account settings, where you can select the 'Cancel Subscription' option.
